title: Examples of Markers:
text:
Conditions such as burn , abilities like Saiyin's Holy Shield , effects from Combat Manoeuvres like Drelgoth's Resolve .

Many effects, abilities and situations in Judgement influence the game state and the interactions between Heroes. Tokens are used to track these effects. There are three types of Tokens in Judgement: Markers, Icons, and Counters. Tokens do not 'Occupy' their hex, impede movement, LoS, or other Token placement in any way. Conditions, Innate/Active Abilities and Combat Manoeuvres that have continuing effects all require the placement of Tokens.
